def  my_range(end):
    i = 0
    while i < end:
        yield i   ## è¿™é‡Œè¿”å› i
        i += 1

## print å‡½æ•°è¿”å›å¯¹è±¡çš„ç±»å‹ï¼š
g = my_range(10)
print(type(g))

ç”Ÿæˆå™¨æ¨å¯¼å¼

ä½ çŸ¥é“åˆ—è¡¨æ¨å¯¼å¼å—ï¼Ÿå…¶å®ç”Ÿæˆå™¨æ¨å¯¼å¼ä¸åˆ—è¡¨æ¨å¯¼å¼å¾ˆç›¸è¿‘ï¼Œåªæ˜¯æŠŠä¸­æ‹¬å·å˜æˆå°æ‹¬å·ï¼š

print (type(gen))
for i in gen:
  print(i)

entry.title: pythonå¤šè¿›ç¨‹ï¼ˆmultiprocessingï¼‰å…±äº«å˜é‡
entry.content:
#!/usr/bin/env python2
# coding: utf8
import multiprocessing

def foo(h,context):
    if h%2 == 0:
        print (h)
    else:
        context.append(h)

if __name__ == "__main__":
    ## è®¾ç½®å…±äº«list
    con = multiprocessing.Manager().list()
    ## è®¾ç½®è¿›ç¨‹æ± å¤§å°
    p = multiprocessing.Pool(2)
    for i in range(18):
        # con = multiprocessing.Manager().list()
        p.apply_async(foo,args=(i,con))
    p.close()
    p.join()
    print con
